StaticText.text: (same commands can be applied to the path in advance)
Drag path through door to open.
Can also open from the side.
RClick on waypoint to choose entry method.
RClick on trooper to choose from available options.
RClick anywhere on the path to plan in advance.
RClick and choose delete to remove parts of the path.
LClick and drag anywhere on the path to reshape.
Go Codes are used for synchronization between troopers.
You can use 4 types of GoCodes or chain more of the same type on a single path.
You can also synchronize actions, like door breaches.
Cover objects stop 50%% of incoming bullets.
The icon indicates the cover direction.
Using the same waypoint controls, you can:
Change targets by dragging/dropping the crosshair (or press TAB).
Fire by using the HUD Fire button (or press S).
Pick your targets carefully, since enemies will hide after the first shot.
You need to restart the game
in order to apply the resolution changes.
